incidents.name: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 23A22
incidents.message: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 23A22 We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the Rack 23A22 in RBX2. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 05/06/2025 15:07 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the rack specified rack are unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
